item.title: Angela add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Angela add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Angela add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "When I was a child my mother said to me, 'If you become a soldier, you'll be a general. If you become a monk, you'll be the pope.' Instead I became a painter and wound up as Picasso." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Angela add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Angela add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Indeed the safest road to Hell is the gradual one--the gentle slope, soft underfoot, without sudden turnings, without milestones, without signposts,...Your affectionate uncle, Screwtape." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Angela add a quote by Clifton Fadiman
item.description: "When you reread a classic you do not see more in the book than you did before; you see more in you than there was before." -- Clifton Fadiman

item.title: Angela add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "How many a man has dated a new era in his life from the reading of a book." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Angela add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is only a novel... or, in short, only some work in which the greatest powers of the mind are displayed, in which the most thorough knowledge of human nature, the happiest delineation of its varieties, the liveliest effusions of wit and humour, are conveyed to the world in the best-chosen language" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Angela add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You come of the Lord Adam and the Lady Eve," said Aslan. "And that is both honour enough to erect the head of the poorest beggar, and shame enough to bow the shoulders of the greatest emperor on earth. Be content." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Angela add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "No woman really wants a man to carry her off; she only wants him to want to do it." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Angela add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "The combination of physical strength and moral sincerity combined with tenderness of heart is exactly what is wanted in a husband.--Ameila Peabody" -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Angela add a quote by P. J. O'Rourke
item.description: "Always read stuff that will make you look good if you die in the middle of it." -- P. J. O'Rourke

item.title: Angela add a quote by Chris Stewart
item.description: "All men will die. All men will be called upon to pass through the veil. But only a few, only a few special men, only those who have been worthy to answer a calling from God, are given the honor to die for a cause. And in this life, in these times, all of us will be called on to make a sacrifice. When, or in what manner that sacrifice may be required, only God knows. All we can do is wait and prepare and pray that when our time comes, we will be ready to complete the task that he gives, so that when it is over, when we have done all we could, we might look to the Lord and say the same words he said : 'I have fought my way through, I have finished the work Thou didst give me to do." -- Chris Stewart

item.title: Angela add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Angela add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Angela add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Angela add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Angela add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Angela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Angela add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You donâ€™t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Angela add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Angela add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Angela add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Angela add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Angela add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Angela add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Angela add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "If we find ourselves with a desire that nothing in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that we were made for another world." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Angela add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Angela add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "We humans are conflicted beings. Our beliefs don't always harmonize with our instincts, and our behavior doesn't always reflect our beliefs. ... We wage war between the person we are and the person we hope to become." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Angela add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "When jumping is the sole option, you jump, and try to make it work." -- Brandon Mull
